panels.description:
For selected stanzas.

Backup sizes:
* **databaze size** - full uncompressed size of the database;
* **database backup size** - the amount of data in the database to actually back up.

These will be the same for full backups.

Repo sizes:
* **repo backup set size** - includes all the files from this backup and any referenced backups in the repository that are required to restore the database from this backup;
* **repo backup size** - includes only the files in this backup.

These will also be the same for full backups. Repository sizes reflect compressed file sizes if compression is enabled.

See https://pgbackrest.org/command.html#command-info

For block incremental backups **repo backup set size** is zero.

matcher.options: Repo block incr delta map size

panels.title: Last backup size

renameByName.Value #F: Repo block incr delta map size

panels.description:
For selected stanzas, repos, backup types, block incremental statuses and backup names.

Backup sizes:
* **databaze size** - full uncompressed size of the database;
* **database backup size** - the amount of data in the database to actually back up.

These will be the same for full backups.

Repo sizes:
* **repo backup set size** - includes all the files from this backup and any referenced backups in the repository that are required to restore the database from this backup;
* **repo backup size** - includes only the files in this backup.

These will also be the same for full backups. Repository sizes reflect compressed file sizes if compression is enabled.

See https://pgbackrest.org/command.html#command-info

For block incremental backups **repo backup set size** is zero.

panels.description:
Information about exporter build parameters and status of getting data from  pgBackRest.

When the information is collected for all available stanzas, the **stanza for metrics** is **all-stanzas**.
panels.title: Exporter status and build info

title: pgBackRest K8s
